CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result of these merits , PSCs based on these previously reported side - chain D-A polymers exhibited a maximal PCE of 4.74% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
2. side-chain D-A polymers: D donor and A acceptor polymers with side chains.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "PSCs" and "side-chain D-A polymers".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells)
2. side-chain D-A polymers (D donor and A acceptor polymers with side chains)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) |
| side-chain D-A polymers (D donor and A acceptor polymers with side chains) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result of these merits , PSCs based on these previously reported side - chain D-A polymers exhibited a maximal PCE of 4.74% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
2. side-chain D-A polymers: D donor and A acceptor polymers with side chains.
3. maximal PCE: Maximum Power Conversion Efficiency.
4. 4.74%: A numerical value representing the maximum power conversion efficiency.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency
2. 4.74%: A numerical value representing the maximum power conversion efficiency.

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

3. 4.74%: Percentage representing the maximum power conversion efficiency.
